resources.string:
Hey, we're Yarden, Aviel and Alaa.
 We made this app to help you in your cryptocurrency investments!
 Have fun getting predictions for upcoming trends.
 Here are a few links:
 	Source code for the app: https://github.com/Aviel212/coin-trend-notifier-app
 	Source code for the backend: https://github.com/yardenshoham/coin-trend-notifier
 	Source code for the website: https://github.com/yardenshoham/coin-trend-notifier-website
